name: Roo.form.BasicForm
desc: Supplies the functionality to do "actions" on forms and initialize Roo.form.Field types on existing markup.

config.name: listeners
fileUpload
config.desc: Set to true if this form is a file upload.

config.name: method
config.desc: The request method to use (GET or POST) for form actions if one isn't supplied in the action options.

config.name: timeout
config.desc: Timeout for form actions in seconds (default is 30 seconds).

config.name: baseParams
config.desc: Parameters to pass with all requests. e.g. baseParams: {id: '123', foo: 'bar'}.

config.name: trackResetOnLoad
config.desc:
If set to true, form.reset() resets to the last loaded
or setValues() data instead of when the form was first created.

config.name: reader
config.desc:
An Roo.data.DataReader (e.g. {@link Roo.data.XmlReader}) to be used to read data when executing "load" actions.
This is optional as there is built-in support for processing JSON.

config.name: errorReader
config.desc:
An Roo.data.DataReader (e.g. {@link Roo.data.XmlReader}) to be used to read data when reading validation errors on "submit" actions.
This is completely optional as there is built-in support for processing JSON.

config.name: url
config.desc: The URL to use for form actions if one isn't supplied in the action options.

methods.name: remove
methods.desc: Removes a field from the items collection (does NOT remove its markup).

methods.name: loadRecord
methods.desc: Loads an Roo.data.Record into this form.

params.name: record
params.desc: The record to load

methods.name: load
methods.desc: Shortcut to do a load action.

params.name: options
params.desc: The options to pass to the action (see {@link #doAction} for details)

methods.name: doAction
methods.desc: Performs a predefined action (submit or load) or custom actions you define on this form.

params.name: actionName
params.desc: The name of the action type

params.name: options
params.desc:
(optional) The options to pass to the action. All of the config options listed below are supported by both the submit and load actions unless otherwise noted (custom actions could also accept other config options): 
Property          Type             Description
----------------  ---------------  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
url               String           The url for the action (defaults to the form's url)
method            String           The form method to use (defaults to the form's method, or POST if not defined)
params            String/Object    The params to pass (defaults to the form's baseParams, or none if not defined)
clientValidation  Boolean          Applies to submit only.  Pass true to call form.isValid() prior to posting to
                                   validate the form on the client (defaults to false)

methods.name: getValues
methods.desc:
Returns the fields in this form as an object with key/value pairs. If multiple fields exist with the same name
they are returned as an array.

methods.name: resetHasChanged
methods.desc:
Resets all hasChanged to 'false' -
The old 'isDirty' used 'original value..' however this breaks reset() and a few other things.
So hasChanged storage is only to be used for this purpose

methods.name: clearInvalid
methods.desc: Clears all invalid messages in this form.

methods.name: isDirty
methods.desc: DEPRICATED Returns true if any fields in this form have changed since their original load.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.desc: Persists the values in this form into the passed Roo.data.Record object in a beginEdit/endEdit block.

params.name: record
params.desc: The record to edit

methods.name: hasChanged
methods.desc: Returns true if any fields in this form have changed since their original load. (New version)

methods.name: applyToFields
methods.desc: Calls {@link Ext#apply} for all fields in this form with the passed object.

methods.name: getFieldValues
methods.desc:
Returns the fields in this form as an object with key/value pairs. 
This differs from getValues as it calls getValue on each child item, rather than using dom data.

methods.name: submit
methods.desc: Shortcut to do a submit action.

params.name: options
params.desc: The options to pass to the action (see {@link #doAction} for details)

methods.name: markInvalid
methods.desc: Mark fields in this form invalid in bulk.

params.name: errors
params.desc: Either an array in the form [{id:'fieldId', msg:'The message'},...] or an object hash of {id: msg, id2: msg2}

methods.name: setValues
methods.desc: Set values for fields in this form in bulk.

params.name: values
params.desc: Either an array in the form [{id:'fieldId', value:'foo'},...] or an object hash of {id: value, id2: value2}

methods.name: isValid
methods.desc: Returns true if client-side validation on the form is successful.

methods.name: render
methods.desc:
Looks at the fields in this form, checks them for an id attribute,
and calls applyTo on the existing dom element with that id.

methods.name: add
methods.desc: Add Roo.form components to this form.

params.name: field2
params.desc: (optional)

params.name: etc
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: applyIfToFields
methods.desc: Calls {@link Ext#applyIf} for all field in this form with the passed object.

methods.name: findField
methods.desc: Find a Roo.form.Field in this form by id, dataIndex, name or hiddenName

params.name: id
params.desc: The value to search for

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets this form.

methods.name: addForm
methods.desc:
Add a secondary form to this one, 
Used to provide tabbed forms. One form is primary, with hidden values 
which mirror the elements from the other forms.

params.name: form
params.desc: to add.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: *beforeaction
events.desc: Fires before any action is performed. Return false to cancel the action.

params.name: action
params.desc: The action to be performed

events.name: *actioncomplete
events.desc: Fires when an action is completed.

params.name: action
params.desc: The action that completed

params.name: action
params.desc: The action that failed
